topic.title: About ZeroID
topic.body:
I afraid that my master seed leaked. But I want to keep this user name. Can I use a new master seed to register a new ID with the original name?
@nofish

1_13RFJdsXQGN5cfMK8GctB6nQZ5xwLmjcfB.body:
> [nofish](#comment_864_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): I'm afraid it's not possible: you need to register a new username

But I want to keep the old one...

27_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv.body: 这个论坛只允许使用英文，中文内容请发到 [NewGFWTalk.bit](/NewGFWTalk.bit)
